name: KarthikDevNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill will have the weekly updates about the recent developments and interesting news about Voice technology and mobile application development. 

This skill is developed to showcase as a demo for my clients as an Alexa Skill developer.

Note: This skill is not endorsed by or affiliated with any companies that develop voice apps or mobile apps. All of the content is curated by myself as an individual developer who loves to work on these technologies and my views also will be added on top of the latest news about the trending news in such technologies.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
